name: Apple, Orange, Banana, Bandana? Quiz / Test  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which fits with red, purple, and green?
questions.explanation:
black.

	Red, purple, green, and black are all COLORS.

questions.text: Which fits with puppy, kitten, and lamb?
questions.explanation:
calf.

	Puppies, kittens, lambs, and calves are all BABY ANIMALS.

questions.text: Which fits with happy, grumpy, and sad?
questions.explanation:
bored.

	Happy, grumpy, sad, and bored are all WAYS PEOPLE FEEL.

questions.text: Which fits with frogs, fishes, and whales?
questions.explanation:
clams.

	Frogs, fishes, whales, and clams all LIVE IN WATER.

questions.text: Which fits with shoes, hats, and shirts?
questions.explanation:
dresses.

	Shoes, hats, shirts, and dresses are all THINGS TO WEAR.

questions.text: Which fits with stoves, refrigerators, and toasters?
questions.explanation:
electric coffee makers.

	Stoves, refrigerators, toasters, and electric coffee makers are all found in the KITCHEN.

questions.text: Which fits with trees, flowers, and bushes?
questions.explanation:
cacti.

	Trees, flowers, bushes, and cactuses are all PLANTS.

questions.text: Which fits with Dalmatians, collies, and Saint Bernards?
questions.explanation:
poodles.

	Dalmatians, collies, Saint Bernards, and poodles are all KINDS OF DOGS.

questions.text: Which fits with rough, smooth, and slick?
questions.explanation:
squishy.

	Rough, smooth, slick, and squishy are all words that tell HOW THINGS FEEL IF YOU TOUCH THEM.

questions.text: Which fits with parrots, penguins, and sparrows?
questions.explanation:
ostriches.

	Parrots, penguins, sparrows, and ostriches are all BIRDS.
